name: nabla-pg
description: A library that greatly controls data access and gives full control over types and queries.

scripts.db:run: docker rm -f nabla-pg ; docker run --name nabla-pg -d -p 5433:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=nabla -e POSTGRES_USER=nabla -e POSTGRES_DB=nabla_db postgres:12.1

author: Sergey Alexeev
